mapper.sql: product_id, product_name, product_model, product_mould_model, product_num, gmt_create, gmt_update,yn
mapper.insert: insert into tb_product (product_id, product_name, product_model, product_mould_model, product_num, gmt_create, gmt_update,yn) values (#{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productMouldModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), now(),0)

insert into tb_product
product_id,
product_name,
product_model,
product_mould_model,
product_num,
gmt_create,
gmt_update,

mapper.update:
update tb_product
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_mould_model = #{productMouldModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_num = #{productNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_product set product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_mould_model = #{productMouldModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_num = #{productNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_update = now(), yn = #{yn} where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from tb_product WHERE yn = 0 limit #{start},#{size}

select
from tb_product WHERE product_name=#{productName} AND yn =0 limit 0,1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_product WHERE yn = 0
